content: Ways I will keep myself safe

Do objects in your environment pose a risk to your safety? Think about weapons, toxins, drugs, alcohol, etc. What are ways you can make your environment safer and protect yourself from self-harm until the crisis passes?
Who can you enlist to help you keep your home safe? You might share your plans with a family member or roommate, so they know how to help if you reach out to them in a time of crisis.
